[Introduction]
Your journey has led you down a path of no return. The acrid smell of death fills the air. And you know the road ahead may lead to your grave. But Quake, with his insidious, apocalyptic plans, must be crushed. If you fail, evil will shroud the universe for all eternity. Hundreds of enemies, hours of fun, 15 levels to beat. Do you have what it takes? Remember this classic shooter and frag like it's 1996!

[Controls]
View: Left Click and Drag
Move: ARROW KEYS(holding SHIFT will speed your movement)
Switch weapons: NUMBER KEYS or /
Move left or right: A and D KEYS
Jump: SPACEBAR or Enter
Fire: CTRL

[About]
Developer: ID Software
